modernLogo.title: Use the current YouTube logo
modernLogo.subtitle: Used since 2017. Enabling this may break some custom themes made before 2017.

largeSearchResults.title: Larger thumbnails on search page
largeSearchResults.subtitle: Will break some custom themes made before 2017.

showVersionInFooter.title: Show Rehike version in the footer
showVersionInFooter.subtitle: Display a convenient link to the Rehike about page at the end of the footer.

useRyd.title: Show dislikes on videos
useRyd.subtitle: Stats from the Return YouTube Dislike API.

usernamePrepends.title: Show "by" before the author's name on video links
usernamePrepends.subtitle: Used before 2016.

noViewsText.title: Remove "views" text from view count on watch page
noViewsText.subtitle: Before 2016, only the count itself was displayed, without any label.

movingThumbnails.title: Show an animated preview when hovering over a video
movingThumbnails.subtitle: Used since 2018.

cssFixes.title: YouTube CSS fixes
cssFixes.subtitle: Fixes bugs or inconsistencies with the original Hitchhiker CSS. May break compatibility with some userstyles.

watchSidebarDates.title: Show upload date on watch page recommendations
watchSidebarDates.subtitle: Unlike Polymer, Hitchhiker didn't show these by default.

teaserReplies.title: Show the first two replies of each comment
teaserReplies.subtitle: Used before 2016. This may slow the time comments take to load. Use at your own discretion.

oldBestOfYouTubeIcons.title: Old red icons in "Best of YouTube" guide section
oldBestOfYouTubeIcons.subtitle: Show the old red topic channel icons, rather than the black ones used today.

enableDebugger.title: Enable the debugger
enableDebugger.subtitle: The debugger provides useful tools for developers. Only enable if you're a developer or reporting a bug and need more information.

clearSigninCache.title: Sign-in cache
clearSigninCache.subtitle: Rehike caches sign-in data as to not make too many requests to YouTube

clearPlayerCache.title: Player cache
clearPlayerCache.subtitle: Rehike caches information about the player as to not make too many requests to YouTube.

factoryReset.title: Reset Rehike
factoryReset.subtitle: Reset Rehike to its defaults, including settings, cache, and any changes that aren't on the remote repository.
